text.autoconfig.comchatutil.option.escap: Accepts Regex, will automatically add a | between entries
text.autoconfig.comchatutil.option.inlin: Commands after which text goes to group chat in any case
text.autoconfig.comchatutil.option.alias: If you want to have shorter toggles, this is for you. Exact text match, Case sensitive, will replace this with the first of the toggle phrases
text.autoconfig.comchatutil.option.escap: The Amount of time to wait between sending of commands when escaping phrases, in game ticks
